entry.string: Delete only the album and move all sub-albums to parent album.
entry.translation: Delete-a oonly zee elboom und mufe-a ell soob-elbooms tu perent elboom.

entry.string: Delete album and all it's sub-albums.
entry.translation: Delete-a elboom und ell it's soob-elbooms. Um gesh dee bork, bork!
